name: Thai Sweet Chili Ketchup
description: Thai sweet chili sauce is good with so many things, and this ketchup creates a similar balance between sugar and chili flakes that's just as versatile.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together ketchup, white sugar, brown sugar, vinegar, chili flakes, and garlic in a small bowl. Use immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to a month.
